attributes.action: Ensure Scottish Independence vote is simple Yes / No
attributes.additional_details:
Alex Salmond has raised the possibility that any future vote on Scottish Independence may include 3 options - Yes to Independence, No to Independence, and a partial separation that would leave some matters in the hands of the UK government.
This is unfair to the rest of the UK. The government should ensure that the Independence vote is a simple yes or no question that would allow the Scots an opportunity to determine their own future.
